cyclone.name: GORDON
cyclone.current_location: about 115 miles ESE of Marathon, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving west-northwest across the Florida Keys into the southeastern Gulf of Mexico, then continuing toward the central Gulf Coast (MS/AL/LA)
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Gulf Coast near the Mississippi–Alabama border

weather_observation.watch_coast: Alabama-Florida border westward to east of Morgan City, LA including Lake Pontchartrain and Lake Maurepas (Tropical Storm Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Mississippi-Alabama border westward to the Mouth of the Mississippi River (Storm-Surge Watch)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Keys and southern Florida peninsula today, then the entire central Gulf Coast from eastern Louisiana to the western Florida Panhandle
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusty squalls possible, sustained winds generally below tropical-storm force
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the northeast Florida coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Light to briefly moderate rain bands may brush northeast Florida; totals generally under 2 inches
